name: Gravitic Well
flavor: You bend gravity into a fine point and pull your foes toward it.
target: Each creature and object in the area

metadata.flavor: You bend gravity into a fine point and pull your foes toward it.
metadata.target: Each creature and object in the area

effects.tier1: 6 damage; vertical pull 5 toward the center of the area
effects.tier2: 9 damage; vertical pull 7 toward the center of the area
effects.tier3: 13 damage; vertical pull 10 toward the center of the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Targets closest to the center of the area are pulled first.

effects.name: Strained
effects.effect: The size of the area increases by 2. You also target yourself and each ally within distance.
